dcterms:creator: Ludovic Denoyer
Patrick Gallinari
dcterms:description: The INEX05 dataset is based on the (m-db-s-0) corpus, comprising 9631 XML-formatted documents represented as trees with maximum output degree L = 32 and assigned to 11 different clusters. Node labels represent 366 different XML tags. The dataset is split into a training set (4820 trees) and a test set (4811 trees).
dcterms:title: INEX05

dcterms:creator: Ludovic Denoyer
Patrick Gallinari
dcterms:description: The INEX06 dataset is composed of 12107 XML-formatted documents representing scientific articles, each from one of 18 different IEEE journals which represent different clusters. The node labels represent different 65 XML tags and maximum output degree L = 66. The dataset is split into a training set (6,053 trees) and a test set (6,054 trees).
dcterms:title: INEX06

dcterms:description: A controlled dataset which contains ternary trees (i.e., L=3), comprising left-asymmetric, symmetric, and right-asymmetric trees. The label of each node encodes structural information since it represents the number of children of the node: therefore the label goes from 0 (i.e., no child nodes) to 3 (i.e., a child node in each position).
dcterms:title: Synthetic dataset
